metadata.title: CVE-2024-31211 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: WordPress is an open publishing platform for the Web. Unserialization ofinstances of the `WP_HTML_Token` class allows for code execution via its`__destruct()` magic method. This issue was fixed in WordPress 6.4.2 onDecember 6th, 2023. Versions prior to 6.4.0 are not affected.

criterions.comment: wordpress package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
